Title: A Sacred Connection
Description:
I may have granted you clearance to wear our armor, but to focus the storm's power through it as the greatest Stormriders do...

The greatest Stormriders in our order do not merely posses the power of the storm. They have mastered it. And this mastery is forged over many battles.

It is time to prove yourself as one of our best.
ObjectivesText: Collect 500 Storm Spirits by slaying powerful creatures of Khaz Algar.

Objectives.Text: Collect Storm Spirits from creatures of Khaz Algar
